links.title: Tesla-SolarCity Merger Could Be Announced Monday, Sources Say
links.description: Tesla Motors and SolarCity could announce they have agreed to merge as early as Monday, people familiar with the matter said, setting the stage for a campaign to convince the two companies' shareholders to back the deal.

messages.body: $TSLA  and $SCTY set to announce merger on Monday http://reut.rs/2aBSHdR

links.title: Tesla, SolarCity set to announce merger on Monday: sources
links.description: Tesla Motors Inc (TSLA.O) and SolarCity Corp (SCTY.O) could announce they have agreed to merge as early as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter. While billionaire Elon Musk is chief executive of Tesla, chairman of SolarCity and the biggest shareholder in both companies, a merger agreement was not certain because SolarCity had formed a special committee to review Tesla's offer independent of the influence of Musk and other executives close to him.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla, SolarCity set to announce merger on Monday: sources http://reut.rs/2aBnPKR via @Reuters

links.title: Tesla, SolarCity set to announce merger on Monday: sources
links.description: Tesla Motors Inc (TSLA.O) and SolarCity Corp (SCTY.O) could announce they have agreed to merge as early as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter. While billionaire Elon Musk is chief executive of Tesla, chairman of SolarCity and the biggest shareholder in both companies, a merger agreement was not certain because SolarCity had formed a special committee to review Tesla's offer independent of the influence of Musk and other executives close to him.
